item.title: MOO! Problems, simple code error i think :D
item.dc:creator: @imp imp
item.description:
@imp wrote:

At the moment i have this in NPC handler, i use testscape, this should change the dark mage to another npc and make him say if im online or not…but it doesnt, i still have a dark mage, no errors tho when i compile!!! I folowed the TUT perfectly, any ideas?

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Imp")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Imp is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Imp is OFFLINE"; } } }

All help appreciated and im very keen on Rep++ if you help :D[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 01:46:17 PM[/size][hr]plz help

Read full topic
